mapper.select: select * from board where valid='I' and title like concat('%',#{search},'%') and contents like concat('%',#{search},'%') and writer like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by num desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};
select * from board where num=#{num} and valid='I';
mapper.update: update board set views= views+1 where num=#{num};
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, contents, writer, file) values(#{title},#{contents},#{writer},#{file});
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where valid='I' and title like concat('%',#{search},'%') and contents like concat('%',#{search},'%') and writer like concat('%',#{search},'%')
